description: Inputs to a plugin. A plugin will use the fields in the entity to process output. Output in this context is a generated form, plot, tables. IndexNodes and TreeView with lazy loading is also suitable as a plugin, where only the first two levels are generated.
name: BasicPluginInput

attributes.name: blueprint
attributes.description: blueprint type is a input to a plugin

attributes.name: children
attributes.description: A list of types that are direct children of the blueprint

attributes.name: inPlace
attributes.description: If the instance should replace blueprint types with the blueprint data. Only children is replaced, while grandchildren will still have references (type as string) to other blueprints. If inPlace is false, recursive code is probably necessary.
